extension.name: Compression
extension.description: A module which provides functionality for compressing and decompressing data.

operation.name: archive
operation.description:
Compresses all the given entries into a new file in the configured format.

Each entry passed to this operation will be placed inside the compressed archive with the name provided by the user in the DataWeave script. e.g.

For this expression:

{ file: vars.aTxtContent, 'dir/resume.pdf': vars.pdf }

The resultant archive will contain 2 entries one named "file" at root level and another one called "resume.pdf" inside a directory called "dir".

+- Archive | \- file1 | \+ dir1 | \- file2

As you can see in the example above, the slash "/" in the name of an entry indicates directory separation, so all names will be introspected to create dirs inside the archive.

parameter.name: entries
parameter.description: the entries to be added to the archive

parameter.name: archiver
parameter.description: the archiving strategy

parameter.name: outputMimeType
parameter.description: The mime type of the payload that this operation outputs.

parameter.name: outputEncoding
parameter.description: The encoding of the payload that this operation outputs.

parameter.name: streamingStrategy
parameter.description: Configure if repeatable streams should be used and their behaviour

parameter.name: target
parameter.description: The name of a variable on which the operation's output will be placed

parameter.name: targetValue
parameter.description: An expression that will be evaluated against the operation's output and the outcome of that expression will be stored in the target variable

operation.name: compress
operation.description:
Compresses a given content using the configured format, ZIP or GZIP.

If a problem occur while compressing the content a COULD_NOT_COMPRESS error will be thrown.

parameter.name: content
parameter.description: the content to be compressed

parameter.name: compressor
parameter.description: the compression strategy

parameter.name: outputMimeType
parameter.description: The mime type of the payload that this operation outputs.

parameter.name: outputEncoding
parameter.description: The encoding of the payload that this operation outputs.

parameter.name: streamingStrategy
parameter.description: Configure if repeatable streams should be used and their behaviour

parameter.name: target
parameter.description: The name of a variable on which the operation's output will be placed

parameter.name: targetValue
parameter.description: An expression that will be evaluated against the operation's output and the outcome of that expression will be stored in the target variable

operation.name: decompress
operation.description:
Decompresses a given single entry compressed content which is assumed to be in an specific format (ZIP or GZIP).

If the given content is not in the configured format an INVALID_ARCHIVE error will be thrown.

Compressed archives can have multiple entries, this operation can handle only single entry archives because if the archive would contain more than one the operation wouldn't know which should return, if the content has more than one entry an TOO_MANY_ENTRIES error will be thrown. For multiple entry archives use the `extract` operation of this module, which will let you choose only formats that accept multiple entries.

parameter.name: compressed
parameter.description: the content to be decompressed

parameter.name: decompressor
parameter.description: the decompression strategy

parameter.name: outputMimeType
parameter.description: The mime type of the payload that this operation outputs.

parameter.name: outputEncoding
parameter.description: The encoding of the payload that this operation outputs.

parameter.name: streamingStrategy
parameter.description: Configure if repeatable streams should be used and their behaviour

parameter.name: target
parameter.description: The name of a variable on which the operation's output will be placed

parameter.name: targetValue
parameter.description: An expression that will be evaluated against the operation's output and the outcome of that expression will be stored in the target variable

operation.name: extract
operation.description: Decompresses a given content that represent an archive in a compression format.

parameter.name: compressed
parameter.description: the content of a compressed archive

parameter.name: extractor
parameter.description: the extractor strategy

parameter.name: streamingStrategy
parameter.description: Configure if repeatable streams should be used and their behaviour

parameter.name: target
parameter.description: The name of a variable on which the operation's output will be placed

parameter.name: targetValue
parameter.description: An expression that will be evaluated against the operation's output and the outcome of that expression will be stored in the target variable

type.name: org.mule.extension.compression.api.strategy.ArchiverStrategy
type.description:
Provides the capability to archive a set of entries into a single archive in some compression format.
@since 2.0

type.name: org.mule.extension.compression.api.strategy.CompressorStrategy
type.description:
Provides the capability to compress data in some compression format.
@since 2.0

type.name: org.mule.extension.compression.api.strategy.DecompressorStrategy
type.description:
Provides the capability to decompress a compressed content in some format.
@since 2.0

type.name: org.mule.extension.compression.api.strategy.ExtractorStrategy
type.description:
Provides the capability to extract the entries of a compressed archive in some format.
@since 2.0

parameter.name: forceZip64
parameter.description: Enables you to archive files and byte arrays greater than 4 GB.

parameter.name: forceZip64
parameter.description: Enables you to compress files and byte arrays greater than 4 GB.
